snippet: A look at Mitt Romney’s reaction to the economic crisis provide a sense of how he might have responded had he been president and how he might approach policy should he be elected.
abstract: Mitt Romney's reactions to economic crisis offer sense of how he might have responded had he been president and how he might approach policy should he be elected.
lead_paragraph: A look at Mitt Romney’s reaction to the economic crisis provide a sense of how he might have responded had he been president and how he might approach policy should he be elected.

headline.seo: What Romney’s Words Tell Us If He’s Elected
headline.main: What Romney Has Said Offers Clues if He Wins
headline.print_headline: What Romney Has Said Offers Clues If He Wins
